segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, just waiting for that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement in her eyes, like she’s about to get the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even care that her brother is about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I guess kids will be kids, but this is just reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen like that before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on the cookie jar, nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost envy her innocence, even if it’s a little annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet she’s thinking about how good those cookies will taste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets her cookie before the whole thing comes crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids really do live in their own little worlds, don’t they?
segments.speaker: PAR
